title: Textile, 1700–1750
medium:
Medium: silk, silver foil on silk core
Technique: compound satin weave with brocading
description: Blue-green satin with vertical rows of large symmetrical floral palmettes between columns of smaller palmettes, large flower heads, feathery leaves, serpentining lace, in tarnished silver, pink, yellow, white, and green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1700–1750.Medium: silk, silver foil on silk core
Technique: compound satin weave with brocading. 1951-112-14-a/c.
